title: Fs--still 100 raw t206's with sovereign backs available --most $19-$23
author: forazzurri2axz

posts.post_title: Fs--still 100 raw t206's with sovereign backs available --most $19-$23
posts.post_content:
I still have about 100 of the original 165 raw T206’s with almost all with Sovereign backs; Great prices , most in the $19.00-$23.00 range. Conditions of the fronts range from so-so to vg-ex, but all have paper loss on the back, resulting in the excellent prices. 

   For those who may have missed my post last week, and are interested in the spreadsheet of available cards, prices, and scans, please email me at [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]

Thanks in advance 
Bill Latzko  770 873 1181
If they are not gone pm sent thankd again bill
